offer.redemption_rules: Offer not redeemable towards wedding or funeral flowers

gift_pack_offer.location_description: Leff's Lucky Town is a place you can come to enjoy great pub food, friendly service, and a lot of laughs with your friends.

Inspired by the traditions of Spain & Portugal, Amilinda utilizes the local resources seasonally available to us from nearby farms. What started as a “pop-up” concept has found a home on historic Wisconsin Avenue in Downtown Milwaukee.

Braise embraces a return to slow grown, natural food. From seasonally inspired menus and creative cocktails, to our hands-on classes and events, we work to educate our community on food.  

Supporting Wisconsin's farmers and artisan producers, we are dedicated to the local economy. When dining at Braise, we hope that you feel it's more than just a meal, but a commitment to our community.

Designed by Rinka Chung Architects, the Wauwatosa location features reclaimed Wisconsin barn wood, industrial elements and a glass enclosed atrium. The 'Tosa location incorporates more private dining and event space, including a beautifully crafted fireplace room (featuring an astounding 90" flat screen television!), and a smaller wine room equipped with a projector and retractable screen ideal for meetings and presentations. This remarkable location offers two levels of seating and can accommodate nearly 300 guests.

Juniper61 is a contemporary American restaurant and bar located on the border of Wauwatosa and Milwaukee. We specialize in unique sandwiches, fresh and boldly flavored salads, and inventive interpretations of classic entrees. Our soups and desserts are made in-house, from scratch, and we feature delicious weekly specials such as individual pizzas on house-made naan and seasonally-inspired entrees and sandwiches. Our goal is to provide our customers with great food and fantastic service in a unique environment — all at a price that makes it easy to return again and again. Welcome and enjoy!

We offer an ever changing menu selection drawing inspiration from all over the world.  Here we play with our food and encourage our guests to maybe take a risk sometimes, to try new things.  We might surprise you.
Meraki is about the guest, to have someone in your “home”.  Its more than just the food; its the ambiance, the mood, the experience.  Whether its dining at our chef’s table talking with the kitchen staff, an intimate evening out with a loved one, a private event, or drinks at our bar, we strive for all our guests to have the absolute best experience possible.

gift_pack.name: 2017 Gift Package
gift_pack.description: Features Deals From Milwaukee Area Restaurants and Local Shops

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
C-viche presents Ibero-American small plates with a Peruvian influence and a focus on fresh ceviches, handcrafted pisco cocktails, and an International wine list that includes wines from Spain and Portugal.

C-viche offers a variety of lime-infused, cilantro-specked dishes, including complex marinated meats, spiced seafood, and the spicy to subtle aji, amarillo and habanero peppers, the classic flavors of Latin America. The C-viche mission is to present Latin American food that is unique & fresh, innovative dishes created with top quality regional and seasonal ingredients. The atmosphere will be fun and energetic!

locations.name: C-Viche
locations.description:
C-viche presents Ibero-American small plates with a Peruvian influence and a focus on fresh ceviches, handcrafted pisco cocktails, and an International wine list that includes wines from Spain and Portugal.

C-viche offers a variety of lime-infused, cilantro-specked dishes, including complex marinated meats, spiced seafood, and the spicy to subtle aji, amarillo and habanero peppers, the classic flavors of Latin America. The C-viche mission is to present Latin American food that is unique & fresh, innovative dishes created with top quality regional and seasonal ingredients. The atmosphere will be fun and energetic!

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
The beloved tavern and eating hall came back to life in November 2014, honoring the Brown Bottle’s rich history with a nod to old world pub fare while offering a more modern style of food and atmosphere in a comfortable and convenient downtown Milwaukee location. Parking is easy to find right outside our doors and we're steps away from Brewers Hill, Beerline B and Riverwest neighborhoods.

The restaurant is led by Executive Chef Ben Hudson, a graduate of the Le Cordon Bleu Culinary Institute in Portland, Oregon, who most recently worked alongside such notable executive chefs as Adam Siegel and Nick Wirth from Bacchus. In Portland, he served as head chef of the vegan restaurant and bar, the Hungry Tiger Too, and was sous Chef at Mama Mia’s Trattoria.

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Diversity is the spice of life, and as long as Company Brewing maintains their affordable happy hour, offers delicious ethnic plates like tostones (flattened, pan fried plantains), and hosts great Milwaukee music, they will find a place in their neighbor’s hearts.

- Urban Milwaukee (August 2015)

locations.name: Company Brewing
locations.description:
Diversity is the spice of life, and as long as Company Brewing maintains their affordable happy hour, offers delicious ethnic plates like tostones (flattened, pan fried plantains), and hosts great Milwaukee music, they will find a place in their neighbor’s hearts.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Street food provides a window into the heritage and tradition of cultures from across the globe. From French crepes to the ramen of Japan, street food tells a story of the land and its people, eaten by them for hundreds of years. It is accessed easily and treasured by locals. At Easy Tyger we feature international dishes spanning the globe and elevate them, in a fun casual atmosphere, with a focus on seasonal and locally inspired ingredients. Our goal is to meld old and new world tradition and bring it to the lively and eclectic Brady Street scene.

locations.name: Easy Tyger
locations.description: Street food provides a window into the heritage and tradition of cultures from across the globe. From French crepes to the ramen of Japan, street food tells a story of the land and its people, eaten by them for hundreds of years. It is accessed easily and treasured by locals. At Easy Tyger we feature international dishes spanning the globe and elevate them, in a fun casual atmosphere, with a focus on seasonal and locally inspired ingredients. Our goal is to meld old and new world tradition and bring it to the lively and eclectic Brady Street scene.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Zarletti serves traditional Italian fare inspired by the country cooking of northern regions such as Piemonte, Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Les Marches. Open since 2004, we have been rated by former Milwaukee food critic Dennis Getto as “the best Italian food being served in Milwaukee these days.” Rustic pasta dishes are abundant and highlighted by an ever changing ravioli, hand made daily. Classic northern Italian entrees feature fresh seafood, veal, lamb and our signature Osso Bucco is an owner favorite and not to be missed. The lunch menu includes pressed panini, pastas and hearty salads including Maryland style crab cakes and herbed salmon filet. Desserts include decadent tiramisu, dense cheesecake and creamy panna cotta, all hand made by our chefs. Our wine list features 78 different reds, whites and spumante with an emphasis on small Italian grower-producers. Please call today to make your reservation and enjoy a little piece of Italy right here on Milwaukee Street. Mangia!

locations.name: Zarletti (Downtown)
locations.description: Zarletti serves traditional Italian fare inspired by the country cooking of northern regions such as Piemonte, Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Les Marches. gift_pack_offers.location_description: Welcome to Zarletti Mequon, where Downtown meets the North Shore. With traditional Italian dishes inspired from Brian Zarletti’s original Downtown Milwaukee location, Zarletti Mequon adds authentic, hand-crafted Neapolitan pizza from our Naples, Italy imported Acunto wood-burning oven. Continuing a tradition of excellence that started with the original location, Zarletti Mequon is a critic’s choice Top 30 Milwaukee area restaurant in both 2014 and 2015.  Don’t miss our pasta dishes including our handmade ravioli’s, signature homemade Burrata, fresh seafood, Strauss veal and other entrée choices. Check us out for lunch or try the Zarletti Mequon brunch offering a unique twist on the usual fare, making for a truly unique experience not found elsewhere.

locations.name: Zarletti (Mequon)
locations.description: Welcome to Zarletti Mequon, where Downtown meets the North Shore. gift_pack_offers.location_description: Established in 2011, the Three Lions Pub is an authentic British pub that provides patrons with an eclectic blend of English culinary standbys and traditional American cuisine.  Three Lions also offers a variety of beers and wines to compliment the menu with many native brands and tastes of the old country. Customer service is paramount in creating the “old world” British-style pub atmosphere that permeates throughout the establishment.  All this is wrapped up in a cozy, friendly neighborhood public house where patrons can enjoy everything from Saturday morning soccer to Thursday night trivia.

Lazy Susan MKE serves a rotating eclectic mix of shareable plates. What’s here today may be gone tomorrow!

gift_pack_offers.location_description: On January 18th, 2010, Pizza Man burned to the ground in a tragic fire, along with the other establishments and apartments in the building. It took me three years to find the perfect new location and the right friendly Pizza Man fans to invest in our resurgence. We've gone to great lengths to recreate the familiar, friendly, and eclectic old-world atmosphere with warmth and intimacy that was loved by so many over the 40 years in our original location. We feel our new home will bring back the memories and inspire many new ones.

locations.name: Pizza Man (Eastside)

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Our mission is to bring together food, beverage, atmosphere, customer service and a great staff into a high-quality experience. Create a unique place where customers can socialize in a comfortable and relaxing environment while enjoying great food and coffee made with fresh and locally sourced product.

We are in the business of helping our customers relieve their daily stresses by providing peace of mind through ambiance, convenient location, and products of consistently high quality.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: The Beerline Café is an inexpensive to moderately priced low-environmental-impact vegetarian “fast-casual” café specializing in unique, mouth-watering sweet and savory crepe creations, panini-style sandwiches, soups, salads, healthy smoothies, fresh juices, local bakery products, Milwaukee’s own Stone Creek Coffee and espresso drinks, and a selection of bottled and tap wines and locally brewed beers. The café has earned a three-star Green Restaurant Association rating, the first in the city of Milwaukee and only the second in the greater Milwaukee metro area.

locations.name: Beerline Cafe
locations.description: The Beerline Café is an inexpensive to moderately priced low-environmental-impact vegetarian “fast-casual” café specializing in unique, mouth-watering sweet and savory crepe creations, panini-style sandwiches, soups, salads, healthy smoothies, fresh juices, local bakery products, Milwaukee’s own Stone Creek Coffee and espresso drinks, and a selection of bottled and tap wines and locally brewed beers. The café has earned a three-star Green Restaurant Association rating, the first in the city of Milwaukee and only the second in the greater Milwaukee metro area.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Welcome to Hue Vietnamese Restaurant. Our mission is to promote and introduce the herbs, spices, and fragrant aromas of Vietnamese dishes in an approachable and modern environment. We are proud to introduce the richness of Vietnamese culture through the many traditional dishes our family still prepares at home.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Clock Shadow Creamery is a pioneering urban cheese factory committed to being a model local venture.  Our goal is to produce and provide our customers with amazingly fresh, local cheese. Our mission is simple; our cheese factory will tread softly on the local environment, provide opportunities to learn the craft of cheese making, educate the public on the nutrient value of fresh dairy products, and connect local farmers choices with the values of our customers.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Experience a taste of New Orleans at The Brass Alley! Authentic scratch cooking, frozen drinks, and your favorite cocktails from The French Quarter. Open seven days a week, serving lunch, brunch on the weekends and dinner along with live entertainment and specials weekly. From live jazz music at brunch to sing-a-long party bands and DJs, we're bringing the excitement of Bourbon Street to Old World 3rd Street in Downtown Milwaukee!

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Bounce Milwaukee is not a giant national chain or a faceless corporation. We're a small family-owned business right here in Milwaukee and we're on site every day to make sure our guests are having the best possible experience.

We thought about all the things we love about family entertainment centers and have built a facility that we think everyone will love. At Bounce Milwaukee, we offer activities for every age and ability level: laser tag, rock climbing, inflatable obstacle courses and a sports arena - even free play of vintage arcade games and air hockey.

We offer healthy, fresh, locally-sourced foods and beverages, and they taste great!  We even have options for adults who want to get out, relax and have fun on their own, and our facility is 21+ after 9pm on weekends.

We're available for birthday parties (for guests of all ages), corporate events, fundraisers and much more.

Note: Tuesdays are reserved for private parties and fundraisers.  Contact us today to reserve your event!

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Family owned and operated since the day we opened our doors in 1986, McBob’s Pub and Grill, located at 4919 W. North Avenue, prides itself in our rich Irish and Scottish traditions. It is these same traditions that inspire us to share our extensive menu with our patrons in our neighborhood bar and grill. We offer up an array of American and traditional Irish dishes influenced by what our hearts and our stomachs love.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Coast In Bikes is a full service bicycle shop in the Walkers Point area - just south of Downtown Milwaukee and Milwaukee's Third Ward. In addition to full bicycle repair services, we sell new bicycles, used bicycles cargo bicycles, as well as parts and accessories.  We also offer bike rentals.  By summer of 2014 we hope to expand with long-term kid bike rentals and bike tours.

locations.name: Coast In Bikes
locations.description: Coast In Bikes is a full service bicycle shop in the Walkers Point area - just south of Downtown Milwaukee and Milwaukee's Third Ward. gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Niemann's Candies was started in 1919 by our grandfather, Frederick Niemann, near the old Colonial Theater.  One of the candies that Frederick started to make was 'Colonial Crunch', a toffee recipe he concocted with lots of almonds and cooked at the high temperature of 300 degrees.  This is the secret to the unusually tender and full flavor characteristics of a great toffee.  
While many things have changed since 1919, one thing that remains constant in Niemann's Candies is our devotion to making each candy using the finest ingredients and the careful crafting of each piece in the Old World, hands-on method; by sight, smell, and feel.  Come in and taste the difference!

locations.name: Niemann's Candies
locations.description:

This is the secret to the unusually tender and full flavor characteristics of a great toffee.  
While many things have changed since 1919, one thing that remains constant in Niemann's Candies is our devotion to making each candy using the finest ingredients and the careful crafting of each piece in the Old World, hands-on method; by sight, smell, and feel.  Come in and taste the difference!

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
In 2006 I left my corporate career behind after 18 years and became a groomer. My main objective as a groomer is to make your pet feel better both physically and psychologically. I love my new career and I believe I can build a special relationship with both the pets and their owners, approaching this job with patience and good humor.

I will do my best to accommodate my customers' busy 
schedule, so let me know what works best for you.

I am looking forward to developing a great relationship with both you and your pet.

locations.name: Four Paws Grooming LLC
locations.description:

schedule, so let me know what works best for you.

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Halo Soap was started in 2002 as a hobby between semesters at UW-Milwaukee. This small farmer's market business has expanded into what it is today - a company that focuses on natural, handmade products made in small batches using quality ingredients. 

We carry a full line of both fragrance oil and essential oils soap, various types of body butters, lotions, creams and salves, many lip balm flavors, bath bombs, body scrubs, products for babies, products for men and so much more. Our product line is constantly changing and expanding as we seek to bring you the best and most unique products possible.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Darren and April Klinter have been the proud owners of Advantage Auto since June 2003. Advantage Auto is a member of both the Saukville Chamber of Commerce and the Better Business Bureau. Our philosophy is to provide our customers with exceptional service at a reasonable cost.

offer.redemption_rules: Offer good towards repair services only

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Anodyne Coffee Roasting Company is a locally owned-Independent roaster of fine coffees located in Milwaukee's Bay View neighborhood. Standing tall and proud in the back of our cafe and visible from the busy sidewalks of Kinnickinnic Avenue our 12 kilo San Franciscan roaster steadily and with great precision produces a grand 18 pounds of precious beans per batch.  With just enough technology to ensure exact repeatable results and the dedication, experience and passion of our roaster/owner we guarantee satisfaction with every roast, every time. All orders delivered with neatness, dispatch and absolute satisfaction. Try the coffee from a true micro roaster where the coffee is roasted just for you.

Standing tall and proud in the back of our cafe and visible from the busy sidewalks of Kinnickinnic Avenue our 12 kilo San Franciscan roaster steadily and with great precision produces a grand 18 pounds of precious beans per batch.  With just enough technology to ensure exact repeatable results and the dedication, experience and passion of our roaster/owner we guarantee satisfaction with every roast, every time. All orders delivered with neatness, dispatch and absolute satisfaction. Try the coffee from a true micro roaster where the coffee is roasted just for you.

locations.name: Anodyne Coffee (Public Market)

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
We created The Ruby Tap to enjoy the things we love most: family, friends, and wine. It's the perfect place to hang out and relax. And the name, The Ruby Tap, is actually after our grandma, Ruby Young.

Located just west of downtown Milwaukee, The Ruby Tap is nestled in Wauwatosa's charming Village neighborhood. A short walk in any direction are great restaurants, shops, and parks.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Juniper61 is a contemporary American restaurant and bar located on the border of Wauwatosa and Milwaukee. We specialize in unique sandwiches, fresh and boldly flavored salads, and inventive interpretations of classic entrees. Our soups and desserts are made in-house, from scratch, and we feature delicious weekly specials such as individual pizzas on house-made naan and seasonally-inspired entrees and sandwiches. Our goal is to provide our customers with great food and fantastic service in a unique environment — all at a price that makes it easy to return again and again. Welcome and enjoy!

Pastiche features a seasonally changing menu of traditional French Bistro dishes prepared whenever possible from locally-sourced ingredients.  Thanks very much for visiting our page, and we look forward to meeting you in person!

locations.name: Pastiche at the Metro
locations.description: Pastiche features a seasonally changing menu of traditional French Bistro dishes prepared whenever possible from locally-sourced ingredients.  Thanks very much for visiting our page, and we look forward to meeting you in person!

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
A glowing, little café with warm service, good food, and reasonable prices, centro café is the realization of a dream, long held by Patrick Moore.
Pat, along with his wife Peg Karpfinger, own and operate the café; a storefront they purchased in 2003 and proceeded, slowly, to rehabilitate.
The space shines with the loving care dedicated to its restoration.
The chefs calmly work their magic behind the front of house grill.
Flames intermittently flare up and reflect in the mirrors on the opposite wall.
Piping hot dishes, prepared individually, arrive at marble tables still steaming.

Centro cafe does not take reservations and seats guests on a first come, first serve basis. Please call if you have any questions.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Invivo offers a unique alternative to high-traffic gyms, studios and medical centers. We are beautiful urban wellness center overlooking the Milwaukee River and bathed in sunlight. We offer everything for the mind, body and spirit, including: yoga, pilates & fitness classes, a fitness center, yoga therapy, personal training, acupuncture, physical therapy, massage & ayurvedic body treatments, chiropractic, pedorthics, nutrition counseling and health psychology.

We also provide customers with options for gluten-free and whole wheat crusts. Homemade bakery, fresh salads, beer and awesome appetizers round out or menu.

offer.redemption_rules: Not valid for delivery.  Must be dine in or carry out.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: “Look good wherever you go” is the promise SHOP makes to you. Co-owners Mary and Liz LeBlanc, a mother-daughter team, opened SHOP to meet the needs of the modern woman who appreciates classic styles and quality fabrics. We scour trade shows all over the country in order to put together a well-edited collection that will move seamlessly from day to night, weekday to weekend and season to season.

locations.name: SHOP Boutique
locations.description: “Look good wherever you go” is the promise SHOP makes to you. gift_pack_offers.location_description:
La Tarte specializes in edibles for discriminating taste buds. We pride ourselves on providing our customers with high quality homemade delectables. We adhere to the highest standards of excellence, using only the finest ingredients.

In 1990, Merry Turner, founder of La Tarte, began supplying upscale groceries in the Milwaukee area with her signature Granny Apple pie. From there the wholesale business grew to include dessert bars and cookies. In 1995 La Tarte moved from its location in a Brookfield school kitchen to its present location in the Hyde Park neighborhood of Wauwatosa. With the move came the addition of a small storefront cafe serving our pastries, espresso drinks, soup, quiche, and croissant sandwiches. In addition we have an ever-changing display of unique gift items including pottery made by Merry's sister, Barb King, of Santa Fe, NM.

locations.name: La Tarte
locations.description:

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Braise embraces a return to slow grown, natural food. From seasonally inspired menus and creative cocktails, to our hands-on classes and events, we work to educate our community on food.  

Supporting Wisconsin's farmers and artisan producers, we are dedicated to the local economy. When dining at Braise, we hope that you feel it's more than just a meal, but a commitment to our community.

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Open since April of 2001, LuLu is an eclectic cafe and bar located in the Bay View neighborhood of Milwaukee. Offering a variety of unique hot sandwiches, salads, and soup, this turn-of-the-century building has become a fun and funky spot for a quick lunch or a relaxed dinner.

locations.name: Cafe Lulu
locations.description: Open since April of 2001, LuLu is an eclectic cafe and bar located in the Bay View neighborhood of Milwaukee. Offering a variety of unique hot sandwiches, salads, and soup, this turn-of-the-century building has become a fun and funky spot for a quick lunch or a relaxed dinner.

gift_pack_offers.location_description:
Valentine Coffee Co. was founded on the premise that coffee begins as a fruit, uniquely evocative of a particular time and place. This character – the terroir – is maximized by carefully roasting beans to the apex of natural sweetness, brightness, and balance… never to bitterness.

We start with the best beans available and a passion for everything delicious. We rely on curiosity, experience, and attention to detail to craft the most expressive – yet satisfying – coffee possible. In this pursuit, we never fail to enjoy ourselves, our work, or our coffee!


Open Mon. - Sat. at 6:00 AM

JDBC Tax Services takes pride in helping you keep more of your hard earned money in YOUR pocket by helping you make the best decisions about your taxes, being assessable year-round and supporting the local community. Located in the NEWD Clothing Company building in the West Vliet Street business district, just minutes from just about anywhere in Milwaukee, JDBC Tax Services has convenient options for you to complete and file your tax returns and at very reasonable prices.

Office Hours By Appointment Only

gift_pack_offers.location_description: Born in 1999, Anodyne Coffee Roasting Company is a locally owned, small batch roaster proudly working in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. We aim to provide an exceptional cup of coffee using just enough technology coupled with the experience of our crew to ensure exact repeatable results and assured satisfaction with every roast, every time. Coffee is what we do. It is what we know and are dedicated to perfecting. So, treat this coffee well. Transport and store in a cool, dry and dark spot. When you run out, stop by, call or order online. We'd love to hear from you and provide the coffee that cures what ails you most.

gift_pack.name: 2018 Restaurant Pack
gift_pack.description: Featuring Discounts at 26 Milwaukee Area Restaurants!

locations.name: Easy Tyger
locations.description: Street food provides a window into the heritage and tradition of cultures from across the globe. From French crepes to the ramen of Japan, street food tells a story of the land and its people, eaten by them for hundreds of years. It is accessed easily and treasured by locals. At Easy Tyger we feature international dishes spanning the globe and elevate them, in a fun casual atmosphere, with a focus on seasonal and locally inspired ingredients. Our goal is to meld old and new world tradition and bring it to the lively and eclectic Brady Street scene.

locations.name: Company Brewing
locations.description:
Diversity is the spice of life, and as long as Company Brewing maintains their affordable happy hour, offers delicious ethnic plates like tostones (flattened, pan fried plantains), and hosts great Milwaukee music, they will find a place in their neighbor’s hearts.

- Urban Milwaukee (August 2015)

locations.name: Cafe Lulu
locations.description: Open since April of 2001, LuLu is an eclectic cafe and bar located in the Bay View neighborhood of Milwaukee. Offering a variety of unique hot sandwiches, salads, and soup, this turn-of-the-century building has become a fun and funky spot for a quick lunch or a relaxed dinner.

locations.name: Braise Restaurant
locations.description:
Braise embraces a return to slow grown, natural food. From seasonally inspired menus and creative cocktails, to our hands-on classes and events, we work to educate our community on food.  

Supporting Wisconsin's farmers and artisan producers, we are dedicated to the local economy. When dining at Braise, we hope that you feel it's more than just a meal, but a commitment to our community.

locations.name: The Ruby Tap
locations.description:
We created The Ruby Tap to enjoy the things we love most: family, friends, and wine. It's the perfect place to hang out and relax. And the name, The Ruby Tap, is actually after our grandma, Ruby Young.

Located just west of downtown Milwaukee, The Ruby Tap is nestled in Wauwatosa's charming Village neighborhood. A short walk in any direction are great restaurants, shops, and parks.

locations.name: Hue Vietnamese Restaurant (Bay View)
locations.description: Welcome to Hue Vietnamese Restaurant. Our mission is to promote and introduce the herbs, spices, and fragrant aromas of Vietnamese dishes in an approachable and modern environment. We are proud to introduce the richness of Vietnamese culture through the many traditional dishes our family still prepares at home.

locations.name: Hue Vietnamese Restaurant (Wauwatosa)
locations.description: Welcome to Hue Vietnamese Restaurant. Our mission is to promote and introduce the herbs, spices, and fragrant aromas of Vietnamese dishes in an approachable and modern environment. We are proud to introduce the richness of Vietnamese culture through the many traditional dishes our family still prepares at home.

locations.name: Beerline Cafe
locations.description: The Beerline Café is an inexpensive to moderately priced low-environmental-impact vegetarian “fast-casual” café specializing in unique, mouth-watering sweet and savory crepe creations, panini-style sandwiches, soups, salads, healthy smoothies, fresh juices, local bakery products, Milwaukee’s own Stone Creek Coffee and espresso drinks, and a selection of bottled and tap wines and locally brewed beers. The café has earned a three-star Green Restaurant Association rating, the first in the city of Milwaukee and only the second in the greater Milwaukee metro area.

locations.name: C-Viche
locations.description:
C-viche presents Ibero-American small plates with a Peruvian influence and a focus on fresh ceviches, handcrafted pisco cocktails, and an International wine list that includes wines from Spain and Portugal.

C-viche offers a variety of lime-infused, cilantro-specked dishes, including complex marinated meats, spiced seafood, and the spicy to subtle aji, amarillo and habanero peppers, the classic flavors of Latin America. The C-viche mission is to present Latin American food that is unique & fresh, innovative dishes created with top quality regional and seasonal ingredients. The atmosphere will be fun and energetic!

locations.name: The Brown Bottle
locations.description:
The beloved tavern and eating hall came back to life in November 2014, honoring the Brown Bottle’s rich history with a nod to old world pub fare while offering a more modern style of food and atmosphere in a comfortable and convenient downtown Milwaukee location. Parking is easy to find right outside our doors and we're steps away from Brewers Hill, Beerline B and Riverwest neighborhoods.

The restaurant is led by Executive Chef Ben Hudson, a graduate of the Le Cordon Bleu Culinary Institute in Portland, Oregon, who most recently worked alongside such notable executive chefs as Adam Siegel and Nick Wirth from Bacchus. In Portland, he served as head chef of the vegan restaurant and bar, the Hungry Tiger Too, and was sous Chef at Mama Mia’s Trattoria.

locations.name: Centro Cafe
locations.description:
A glowing, little café with warm service, good food, and reasonable prices, centro café is the realization of a dream, long held by Patrick Moore.
Pat, along with his wife Peg Karpfinger, own and operate the café; a storefront they purchased in 2003 and proceeded, slowly, to rehabilitate.
The space shines with the loving care dedicated to its restoration.
The chefs calmly work their magic behind the front of house grill.
Flames intermittently flare up and reflect in the mirrors on the opposite wall.
Piping hot dishes, prepared individually, arrive at marble tables still steaming.

Centro cafe does not take reservations and seats guests on a first come, first serve basis. Please call if you have any questions.

locations.name: McBob's Pub & Grill
locations.description: Family owned and operated since the day we opened our doors in 1986, McBob’s Pub and Grill, located at 4919 W. North Avenue, prides itself in our rich Irish and Scottish traditions. It is these same traditions that inspire us to share our extensive menu with our patrons in our neighborhood bar and grill. We offer up an array of American and traditional Irish dishes influenced by what our hearts and our stomachs love.

locations.name: Transfer Pizzeria Cafe
locations.description: Welcome to Transfer Pizzeria and Cafe! We are located at the intersection of 1st, Mitchell and Kinnickinnic Ave – just 1 1/2 miles south of downtown Milwaukee. Transfer staff and chef extraordinaire Vasyl look forward to serving you soon. Takeout, Catering, and Reservations of 6 or more… Call 414.763.0438

locations.name: Leff's Lucky Town
locations.description: Leff's Lucky Town is a place you can come to enjoy great pub food, friendly service, and a lot of laughs with your friends.

locations.name: Amilinda
locations.description: Inspired by the traditions of Spain & Portugal, Amilinda utilizes the local resources seasonally available to us from nearby farms. What started as a “pop-up” concept has found a home on historic Wisconsin Avenue in Downtown Milwaukee.

locations.name: Meraki
locations.description:
We offer an ever changing menu selection drawing inspiration from all over the world.  Here we play with our food and encourage our guests to maybe take a risk sometimes, to try new things.  We might surprise you.
Meraki is about the guest, to have someone in your “home”.  Its more than just the food; its the ambiance, the mood, the experience.  Whether its dining at our chef’s table talking with the kitchen staff, an intimate evening out with a loved one, a private event, or drinks at our bar, we strive for all our guests to have the absolute best experience possible.

locations.name: Zarletti (Downtown)
locations.description: Zarletti serves traditional Italian fare inspired by the country cooking of northern regions such as Piemonte, Emilia-Romagna, Tuscany, and Les Marches. Open since 2004, we have been rated by former Milwaukee food critic Dennis Getto as “the best Italian food being served in Milwaukee these days.” Rustic pasta dishes are abundant and highlighted by an ever changing ravioli, hand made daily. Classic northern Italian entrees feature fresh seafood, veal, lamb and our signature Osso Bucco is an owner favorite and not to be missed. The lunch menu includes pressed panini, pastas and hearty salads including Maryland style crab cakes and herbed salmon filet. Desserts include decadent tiramisu, dense cheesecake and creamy panna cotta, all hand made by our chefs. Our wine list features 78 different reds, whites and spumante with an emphasis on small Italian grower-producers. Please call today to make your reservation and enjoy a little piece of Italy right here on Milwaukee Street. Mangia!

locations.name: Zarletti (Mequon)
locations.description: Welcome to Zarletti Mequon, where Downtown meets the North Shore. With traditional Italian dishes inspired from Brian Zarletti’s original Downtown Milwaukee location, Zarletti Mequon adds authentic, hand-crafted Neapolitan pizza from our Naples, Italy imported Acunto wood-burning oven. Continuing a tradition of excellence that started with the original location, Zarletti Mequon is a critic’s choice Top 30 Milwaukee area restaurant in both 2014 and 2015.  Don’t miss our pasta dishes including our handmade ravioli’s, signature homemade Burrata, fresh seafood, Strauss veal and other entrée choices. Check us out for lunch or try the Zarletti Mequon brunch offering a unique twist on the usual fare, making for a truly unique experience not found elsewhere.

gift_pack.name: 2018 Family Pack
gift_pack.description: Filled With Family-Friendly Deals Around Milwaukee

locations.name: Pizza Man (Eastside)
locations.description: On January 18th, 2010, Pizza Man burned to the ground in a tragic fire, along with the other establishments and apartments in the building. It took me three years to find the perfect new location and the right friendly Pizza Man fans to invest in our resurgence. We've gone to great lengths to recreate the familiar, friendly, and eclectic old-world atmosphere with warmth and intimacy that was loved by so many over the 40 years in our original location. We feel our new home will bring back the memories and inspire many new ones.

locations.name: Pizza Man (Wauwatosa)
locations.description: Designed by Rinka Chung Architects, the Wauwatosa location features reclaimed Wisconsin barn wood, industrial elements and a glass enclosed atrium. The 'Tosa location incorporates more private dining and event space, including a beautifully crafted fireplace room (featuring an astounding 90" flat screen television!), and a smaller wine room equipped with a projector and retractable screen ideal for meetings and presentations. This remarkable location offers two levels of seating and can accommodate nearly 300 guests.

offer.redemption_rules: Offer valid one time during 2018.  Good towards online pint orders only.

promo_code_detail.title: 15% Off One Online Order of 4-Pack Ice Cream Pints

locations.name: Purple Door Ice Cream
locations.description:
Purple Door Ice Cream is owned and operated by Lauren and Steve Schultz. Two educators for over 18 years combined, Lauren and Steve have taken their love for creativity, learning and forward thinking from the classroom to the kitchen. Both are passionate about creating a quality, delicious product while supporting the community and respecting the earth.

Purple Door Ice Cream uses quality and local ingredients in the making of their product.  The flavor combinations span from "the classics" to "are you kidding me?". Flavor ingredients include top-of-the-line cocoas, liquors, coffee beans, teas, spices, and fresh and seasonal fruits. Every batch of Purple Door ice cream is hand-crafted in small batches and taste-tested for balance, accuracy and depth.

locations.name: Betty Brinn Children's Museum
locations.description: Children's Museum

offer.redemption_rules: Family Fun Pack includes 4 “Everything” admissions, a 16 inch pizza with unlimited toppings, 4 beverages and 4 freshly-baked cookies.  $119 before discount.

locations.name: Bounce Milwaukee
locations.description:
Bounce Milwaukee is not a giant national chain or a faceless corporation. We're a small family-owned business right here in Milwaukee and we're on site every day to make sure our guests are having the best possible experience.

We thought about all the things we love about family entertainment centers and have built a facility that we think everyone will love. At Bounce Milwaukee, we offer activities for every age and ability level: laser tag, rock climbing, inflatable obstacle courses and a sports arena - even free play of vintage arcade games and air hockey.

We offer healthy, fresh, locally-sourced foods and beverages, and they taste great!  We even have options for adults who want to get out, relax and have fun on their own, and our facility is 21+ after 9pm on weekends.

We're available for birthday parties (for guests of all ages), corporate events, fundraisers and much more.

Note: Tuesdays are reserved for private parties and fundraisers.  Contact us today to reserve your event!

locations.name: Cream City Caramels & Confections
locations.description: For more than thirty years we've been making caramels for friends and family. Now they are available to everyone! We use the finest ingredients, sourced locally whenever possible, to handcraft our Sweet and Salty Caramels in a variety of flavors. You'll enjoy their melt-in-your-mouth buttery goodness and smooth creamy texture. Our caramels are soft and creamy, not hard and chewy.
